extendedInfo.description: iRecycle is the premiere application for finding local, convenient recycling opportunities when you are on the go or at home. iRecycle provides access to more than 1,500,000 ways to recycle over 350 materials.FIND LOCAL RECYCLING FASTiRecycle can tell you how, where and when to recycle just about anything. Using your current location, ZIP code, address or city, get access to vital details for collection points, such as website, phone number, directions, hours of operation and other materials collected.CONNECT SOCIALLYShare your enthusiasm for recycling by connecting through Facebook, Twitter, SMS and email. REVIEWS âWhat this application does is present you with an amazingly simple-to-use interface that shows categories of recycling, first of all. This app is so easy to use and so helpful when we want to recycle our wares that itâs almost amazing that itâs free. Thanks to Earth911 though, it certainly is free, and itâs certainly worth a download â grab it!â - Chris Burns, SlashGearâiRecycle is sure to be your new go-to consultant for recycling locations and tips.â- App of the Month, atomicaxis.comâThe iRecycle app provides a great resource for customers who are looking for up-to-date information about recycling and sustainability.â - Ralph Reid, vice president of corporate responsibility for Sprint.  âEarth911 makes their fabulous recycling search feature into an iPhone app with some convenient features.â - Mother Nature NewsâEven when you think you're eco-savvy, sometimes you still find yourself asking, "Can I recycle this? If so...who takes it?" Kinda cool your phone can now answer that for you.â - Treehugger.com

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: This app does not list all the recycling yards available.  There were 3 scrap yards located in my local area in Newton NJ and not one of them were listed..  Useless!
reviews.author: mike miller

reviews.title: Sad, unfortunate disappointment
reviews.comment: I really wanted to love this app. I really did-but alas, it force closes on me constantly & w/out fail, everytime I opened the app; it was as if I was waiting for a bomb to explode, knowing that @ any moment, the app will close on me. If the app worked, I would gladly give 5*s & rave review... but it seems, I\'ll be generous & give 2*s until all is resolved. W/ how badly it performs, it\'s certainly not worth the overstepping, uncomfortable permissions.  Samsung Transform Ultra
reviews.author: AmerasianGoddess

reviews.title: Misses the mark
reviews.comment: Distance reported is wrong, distance is only in miles, does not find all recycling centres and very hard to search through all the recycle items, good try but misses the mark and full of errors.
reviews.author: Skye Lawson

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: I really don\'t understand why this app is still here. All the addresses are wrong and not updated.
reviews.author: Omar Alay\303\263n

reviews.title: It\'s ok
reviews.comment: The program is good if one lives in the US. Crappy if you not. I did mention to developers about recycling locations in my area several months ago. They neither bother adding it in. I guess they think the internet stops at US boards.
reviews.author: Anthony Lenzo

reviews.title: Won\'t work
reviews.comment: Errors for everything, never got to use it
reviews.author: lizz lomax

reviews.title: Looks good but only US...duh
reviews.comment: Sometimes I wish I actually lived in New York just so I can use all these useful apps on GPlay.
reviews.author: Jacques Knipe

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Useless,won\'t work!!  Don\'t waste ur app storage!!!
reviews.author: Nathan Rego

reviews.title: I was very excited for this
reviews.comment: But.... It\'s doesn\'t work at all. It\'s not locating anything
reviews.author: Janeen Stokes

reviews.title: US only
reviews.comment: Only has US locations. So why is the app available in other countries? Seems well made though and gave me ideas where I could bring a few items, otherwise it\'s useless for me.
reviews.author: Patrick Lake

reviews.title: No cardboard
reviews.comment: Still very good 4 and a quarter stars
reviews.author: Millie Barnwell

reviews.title: Errors
reviews.comment: It always is saying error
reviews.author: mason muse

reviews.comment: Great App!
reviews.author: David Barnes

reviews.title: No Canada
reviews.comment: Useless.. Uninstalled
reviews.author: Gordon Hawkins

reviews.title: Jitendra
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: Jitendra Suxena

reviews.comment: it\'s Great!
reviews.author: Dena Nelson

reviews.title: Not quite great yet...
reviews.comment: Remove \"Automatic Load on Boot\" permission, and I\'ll reconsider. Also seems overly large and sometimes slow to respond.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very cool app, but\342\200\246
reviews.comment: Why do you have to run in the background nonstop? !? Being able to find recycling as needed is great, but I don\'t need it running 24/7\342\200\246 Thanks, but I\'ll reinstall once it runs when needed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Runs in background but good app
reviews.comment: I wish it wouldnt run in the background. I might uninstall just from this. Havent made up my mind yet. This is a good app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Found recycling facility faster than google search
reviews.comment: This app is perfect for quickly finding recycling facilities closest to you. If you have items that you\'re not sure if you can recycle, or where you can recycle them, this app will help you find something quickly. If it weren\'t for this app, I would have thrown away toxic items!
reviews.author: A Google User
